Console_UnknowType: Unknow console type was going to be used.
Console_UnknowColor: Unknow color used for %where%. Color must be a key of colorsChoices, but you are using %what%.
ConsoleProgress_InvalidArgument: Invalid progress bar parameters. current & total must be defined as numbers.
Data_InvalidURL: Invalid url argument. Must be an http protocol url, but your are using %what%.
Data_UnknowURL: Unknow url argument. Must be a key of urlChoices, but you are using %what%.
